grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 過酷【カコク】severe, harsh, hard, cruel, rigorous
kun reading compounds: 苛める【いじめる】to ill-treat, to bully, to torment, to pick on, to tease, to be cruel to, to persecute, to be tough on (e.g. one's body), to treat harshly
苛む【さいなむ】to torment, to torture, to harass
苛立つ【いらだつ】to be irritated, to get annoyed, to lose one's patience
